main.docTitle: Ozone Layer Protection (Products Containing Scheduled Substances) (Import Banning) Regulation

section.name: s2
section.heading: Interpretation
section.leadIn: In this Regulation, unless the context otherwise requires—
section.def: aerosol product (噴霧劑產品) means a container that contains a substance packed under pressure and that is fitted with a valve for the purpose of discharging a substance as aerosol, spray, fog, mist, gas, foam, paste or cream but does not include a container used solely for the transportation or storage of the substance;

def.name: Airconditioner
def.leadIn: air-conditioner (空調機) means an encased assembly or encased assemblies that—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: is or are designed primarily to provide free delivery of conditioned air to an enclosed space, room or zone; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: has or have a prime source of refrigeration for cooling or heating; (L.N. 244 of 2009)

def.name: ControlledProduct
def.leadIn: controlled product (受管制產品) means any of the following things that contains a scheduled substance listed in Part 1, 2, 3, 8 or 9 of the Schedule to the Ordinance— (L.N. 244 of 2009)

paragraph.name: a
b
paragraph.content: any refrigeration equipment or air-conditioning or heat pump equipment (whether for domestic or commercial use); (L.N. 244 of 2009)

paragraph.name: d
paragraph.content: an insulation panel, insulation board or insulation pipe cover;

section.def: motor vehicle (汽車) means a mechanically propelled vehicle for use on roads;
portable fire extinguisher (手提式滅火器) means a portable fire extinguisher that contains a scheduled substance listed in Part 1, 2, 3, 8 or 9 of the Schedule to the Ordinance; (L.N. 244 of 2009)

def.name: Prepolymer
def.leadIn: pre-polymer (預聚合物) means a polymer that—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: has a low degree of polymerization;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: is prepared through preliminary reaction of polyisocyanate and polyol; and

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: is used in the production of polyurethane foam;

section.def: refrigeration equipment (冷凍設備) includes refrigerators, freezers, chillers, dehumidifiers, water coolers and ice machines; (L.N. 244 of 2009)

def.name: Transhipment
def.leadIn: transhipment (轉運) means the importation of a controlled product that—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: is consigned on a through bill of lading or a through air waybill from a place outside Hong Kong to another place outside Hong Kong; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.leadIn: is or is to be removed from the vessel, vehicle or aircraft in which it was imported, and, before being exported, is either—

subparagraph.name: i
subparagraph.content: returned to the same vessel, vehicle or aircraft; or

subparagraph.name: ii
subparagraph.content: transferred to another vessel, vehicle or aircraft, whether it is or is to be transferred directly between the vessels, vehicles or aircraft or whether it is to be landed in Hong Kong after its importation and stored, pending exportation. (L.N. 244 of 2009)

subsection.content: No person shall import a controlled product from any country or place, whether or not the country or place is bound by the terms of the Montreal Protocol. (L.N. 244 of 2009, 7 of 2025 s. 31)

subsection.name: 1A
subsection.content: Without prejudice to subsection (1), no person shall import a portable fire extinguisher from any country or place, whether or not bound by the terms of the Montreal Protocol, unless the Director of EP after consulting the Director of Fire Services certifies that the portable fire extinguisher is required for essential applications relating to emergency situations or where lives are at risk. (L.N. 443 of 1996, 7 of 2025 s. 31)

subsection.leadIn: This section does not apply to a controlled product or portable fire extinguisher imported into Hong Kong by a vessel, aircraft or vehicle if the controlled product or portable fire extinguisher is— (L.N. 443 of 1996)

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: the necessary equipment or part of the necessary stores of the vessel, aircraft or vehicle;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: an item of personal property reasonably required for the personal use of the crew or passengers of the vessel, aircraft or vehicle;

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: an used item imported for the personal use of an owner who is taking up residence in Hong Kong; or

paragraph.name: d
paragraph.content: imported by a passenger of the vessel, aircraft or vehicle in his personal baggage or carried by him.

subsection.name: 2A
subsection.leadIn: This section does not apply to a controlled product that is—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: in the course of transhipment; or

subsection.name: 2B
subsection.leadIn: In a prosecution for an offence under this section, a controlled product that is found in Hong Kong is presumed, in the absence of evidence to the contrary, to be a controlled product that is not—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: in the course of transhipment; or

subsection.content: A person who contravenes this section commits an offence and is liable to a fine of $1,000,000 and to imprisonment for 2 years. (L.N. 244 of 2009)
